participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Creative and ambitious, with a love for art and storytelling.
participant_1.background: My painting is my passion, and a Corvette would be the icing on the cake. I am a rapper. I broke my nose in 5th grade. I write children’s books. I am studying for my masters.

participant_2.name: Taylor
participant_2.personality: Sociable and adventurous, with a passion for law and a love for nature.
participant_2.background: I'm 5'10", but I feel like I'm taller than that because of my hair. I am pursuing my law degree. I'm always looking for wildlife when I'm outside. I make friends fast and say goodbye fast. I'm afraid of forgetting the memories of my travels.

content.text: Hi there! Not much, just working on a law case.
What kind of law are you studying?
I am pursuing my law degree.
That is awesome! I am studying for my masters in painting.
Wow, art is my passion. I love to paint.
Really? Have you ever sold any of your paintings?
Not yet, but I am working on it. I want to start an art gallery one day.
That is a great goal! I would love to see one of your paintings.
I would be happy to show you one. I paint children's books too.
That is so cool! I love children's books.
I am glad you do. I am always looking for wildlife when I am outside. I love nature and animals.
Me too! I love to go hiking and camping.
I do too! I love the fresh air and being outdoors.
I have a cat and a dog.
That is awesome! I have a cat too.
